description: Aplikasi game edukasi untuk anak balita usia 2-5 tahun dengan konten 100% Bahasa Indonesia dan budaya lokal. Dibangun dengan Godot 4.2 untuk Android 8.0+.

userStories.title: Godot Project Setup & Base Structure
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to initialize the Godot 4.2 project with proper folder structure so that all team members can work consistently.
acceptanceCriteria: Godot 4.2 LTS project created with project.godot configured
Folder structure: /assets/sounds, /assets/textures, /assets/locales, /scenes, /scripts
Main.tscn scene created with Node2D root
project.godot has Android 8.0+ (API 26) export preset configured
Application/config/name set to 'PlayTap'
Display/window/size/viewport_width set to 540, viewport_height to 960 (portrait)

userStories.title: Audio Bus Architecture Configuration
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to configure audio buses so that different audio types can be controlled independently.
acceptanceCriteria: Audio bus layout created in project settings
Master bus at 0dB
Background bus child of Master at -8dB
SFX bus child of Master at -3dB
Voice bus child of Master at -4dB
Bus layout saved to default_bus_layout.tres

userStories.title: Localization System Setup
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to set up the localization system so that all text can be displayed in multiple languages.
acceptanceCriteria: TranslationManager.gd script created with get_text(key) function
/assets/locales/id.json created with Indonesian translations
/assets/locales/en.json created with English translations
Localization keys use snake_case format (e.g., game_tap_pop_name)
Project locale set to 'id' as default in project settings

userStories.title: Scene Structure & Signal System
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to create the base scene hierarchy and signal system for game transitions.
acceptanceCriteria: MainMenu.tscn scene created with Control root
GameSceneBase.tscn template created for mini-games
Global autoload (GameManager.gd) created for signal emission
Signals defined: game_started(game_name), game_ended(game_name, metrics), reward_trigger(type)
Scene change transition: fade_to_scene(scene_path) function with 1s tween

userStories.title: SQLite Database Schema Setup
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to create the SQLite database schema so that session data can be persisted.
acceptanceCriteria: Database.gd script created with connection logic
sessions table created: id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, game_type TEXT, start_time TIMESTAMP, duration_seconds INTEGER, metrics TEXT
paintings table created: id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, source TEXT, filepath TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP
Database initialized in user://playtap.db path
Helper functions: log_session(), get_paintings(), delete_old_sessions()

userStories.title: Session Manager Singleton
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to create SessionManager.gd to track gameplay metrics across all games.
acceptanceCriteria: SessionManager.gd autoload created
Variables: current_game, start_time, tap_count, content_category
Functions: start_session(game_name), end_session(), record_tap(), get_session_duration()
Auto-saves session to database on end_session() call
Session data written to user:// directory only (no cloud)

userStories.title: Main Menu Scene Layout
userStories.description: As a child, I need a colorful menu to choose games so that I can play independently.
acceptanceCriteria: PlayTap logo TextureRect (120x60px) at top of menu
Wayang mascot AnimatedSprite (120x120px) with idle animation
GridContainer with 2 columns, 5 rows for game buttons
Each game button: TextureRect icon + Label for name below
Parent button (gear icon) at bottom-right corner
TapCountLabel showing today's play count
All buttons have min_size 120x120px for toddler touch targets

userStories.title: Audio Manager Singleton
userStories.description: As a developer, I need AudioManager.gd to handle all audio playback with proper bus routing.
acceptanceCriteria: AudioManager.gd autoload created
Functions: play_sfx(path, bus='SFX'), play_voice(path), play_music(path, loop=true)
set_volume(bus_name, volume_db) function for volume control
SFX player pool supports up to 4 simultaneous sounds
Voice player has priority over SFX (ducking when voice plays)
All audio paths relative to /assets/sounds/

userStories.title: Tap Pop - Scene & Balloon Spawn System
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to create the TapPop scene with balloon spawning logic.
acceptanceCriteria: TapPopGame.tscn created with Node2D root
Balloon.tscn scene with Area2D + Sprite + CircleShape2D (40px radius)
Spawn logic: random position within 200px margins from screen edges
Maximum 3 balloons visible at once
Balloon colors: red (#E84A3D), blue (#38BDF8), yellow (#FBBF24), green (#34D399)
Balloons respawn 1 second after being popped

userStories.title: Tap Pop - Touch Detection & Pop Animation
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to implement balloon tap detection and pop effects.
acceptanceCriteria: _input_event function detects taps on balloon Area2D
On tap: scale tween from 1.0 to 0 over 200ms with EASE_OUT
Particle burst: 8 small circles emitted from balloon center
Haptic feedback: OS.vibrate_msec(50) on successful tap
Balloon removed from scene after pop animation completes
New balloon spawns 1 second after pop

userStories.title: Tap Pop - Audio Feedback & Session Tracking
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to add audio feedback and session logging to Tap Pop game.
acceptanceCriteria: On balloon tap: play pop_success.ogg via AudioManager
Play word callout based on balloon color (e.g., 'merah!' for red)
Audio files in /assets/sounds/words/id/warna_{color}.ogg format
Each tap recorded via SessionManager.record_tap()
Session auto-ends after 60 taps OR 10 minutes via SessionManager.end_session()
No timer, no score, no failure state displayed to child

userStories.title: Tap Pop - Age Gating Implementation
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to adjust balloon count based on child's age from parent settings.
acceptanceCriteria: Read child_age from parent settings (default: 3)
Ages 2-3: spawn only 2 balloons, colors limited to red/blue/yellow
Ages 4-5: spawn 3 balloons, all colors available
Age checked on game start via GameManager.get_child_age()
Balloon count adjusted immediately if age setting changes between sessions

userStories.title: Drag Match - Scene & Shape Setup
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to create the DragMatch scene with draggable shape objects.
acceptanceCriteria: DragMatchGame.tscn created with Control root
Shape.tscn scene with Control node + ColorRect (50x50px)
Shapes: Circle, Square, Triangle, Star, Heart (using TextureRect or Polygon2D)
Slot.tscn scene with ColorRect placeholder (60x60px)
2-4 shape pairs spawned based on session number
Shapes arranged at bottom, slots arranged in grid at center

userStories.title: Drag Match - Drag & Drop Logic
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to implement drag detection and drop validation for shapes.
acceptanceCriteria: _gui_input function detects MOUSE_BUTTON press + motion for drag start
10px deadzone before drag activates (prevents accidental drags)
During drag: shape opacity 0.7, scale 1.1, follows cursor
On button release: check if shape overlaps with slot Area2D
Drop detection: get_overlapping_areas() on shape
Shape snaps back to original position if dropped outside slot

userStories.title: Drag Match - Match Validation & Feedback
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to validate correct matches and provide audiovisual feedback.
acceptanceCriteria: On drop: compare shape.shape_type with slot.slot_type
Correct match: play success SFX, play word callout (e.g., 'lingkaran!'), slot highlights
Correct match: shape tweens to slot center (0.2s easing)
Wayang mascot plays dance animation on correct match
Incorrect match: gentle SFX, shape bounces back (0.3s tween)
Matched pair removed after 1 second delay
Session ends after 8 successful matches OR 10 minutes

userStories.title: Drag Match - Progression System
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to implement session-based difficulty progression.
acceptanceCriteria: Track times_played per shape type in game_progress table
Sessions 1-3: 2 shapes only (100% match rate expected)
Sessions 4-7: 3 shapes
Sessions 8+: 4 shapes
Progression transparent to user (no 'level up' messages)
Shape count checked on game start from database

userStories.title: Memory Flip - Scene & Card Setup
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to create the MemoryFlip scene with card grid layout.
acceptanceCriteria: MemoryFlipGame.tscn created with Control root
Card.tscn scene with Control + ColorRect for front/back
Card front: blue gradient with ? icon
Card back: TextureRect for content image
2x2 grid (4 cards) for ages 2-3, 2x3 grid (6 cards) for ages 4+
Card size: 60x60px, 10px spacing between cards
Grid centered on screen with 40px margins

userStories.title: Memory Flip - Card Flip Animation & State
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to implement card flip mechanics with animation.
acceptanceCriteria: Card.gd script with flipped, matched, content_id variables
On click: rotate Y axis from 0 to 180 degrees over 0.3s (tween with EASE_IN_OUT)
Flip soft SFX plays on flip (/sounds/flip_soft.ogg)
Max 2 cards can be flipped simultaneously (state: flipping, waiting, reset)
Flipped cards stored in array for match comparison
Match check triggered after 0.5s delay when 2 cards flipped

userStories.title: Memory Flip - Match Logic & Win Condition
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to implement match detection and win state handling.
acceptanceCriteria: Compare content_id of 2 flipped cards
Match: play match_success SFX, word callout, glow effect on cards
Matched cards set to 0.5 opacity and disable further clicks
No match: play gentle SFX, flip both cards back after 0.5s
Win condition: all pairs matched → celebration SFX + 'Wah hebat!' label
Auto-transition to menu after 3 seconds on win

userStories.title: Piano Hewan - Scene & Key Layout
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to create the PianoHewan scene with interactive piano keys.
acceptanceCriteria: PianoGame.tscn created with Control root
PianoKey.tscn scene with Control + ColorRect (50x150px)
5 keys arranged horizontally at screen center
Each key has TextureRect for animal icon above it
Key colors: distinct colors (red, blue, yellow, green, orange)
2px spacing between keys

userStories.title: Piano Hewan - Sound Playback & Polyphony
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to implement animal sound playback with multi-touch support.
acceptanceCriteria: Key mapping stored: C4=Komodo, D4=Orangutan, E4=Burung, F4=Paus, G4=Belalang
On tap: play animal sound once via AudioManager
On hold (press): loop sound for max 3 seconds, then fade out
Multi-touch enabled: up to 3 simultaneous sounds (polyphonic)
Key highlight: brightness +30% on press, fade out on release
Haptic: 30ms vibrate on press, 50ms on release

userStories.title: Piano Hewan - Character Animation & Auto-Exit
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to add mascot reaction and inactivity timeout.
acceptanceCriteria: Wayang mascot dances while any sound plays (animation syncs to rhythm)
Inactivity timer starts at 15 minutes on game start
Timer resets on any key press
After 15 min inactivity: fade to menu with 'Sampai jumpa!' message
No time limit displayed to child during play

userStories.title: Finger Paint - Canvas & Drawing System
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to create the FingerPaint scene with drawing canvas.
acceptanceCriteria: FingerPaintGame.tscn created with Control root
Canvas: ColorRect 800x600px at screen center, white background
Brush system: line drawing on InputEvent.MOUSE_MOTION while pressed
Brush size: 20px diameter default, stored in current_brush_size variable
Anti-aliasing enabled on line drawing
Line smoothing: every 2 points averaged to reduce jitter
Strokes stored in Array[Dictionary] with points, color, size
Max 500 strokes (new strokes replace oldest if limit reached)

userStories.title: Finger Paint - Color Palette & Tools
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to add color selection and drawing tools.
acceptanceCriteria: 8 color buttons at bottom: red, blue, yellow, green, pink, orange, purple, black
Each button: 40x40px circular ColorRect
Active color highlighted with glow effect
Brush size buttons: small (10px), medium (20px default), large (30px)
Clear All button: shows confirmation dialog 'Hapus gambar?'
Dialog has OK/Batal buttons, centered on screen

userStories.title: Finger Paint - Save & Haptic Feedback
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to implement save functionality and touch feedback.
acceptanceCriteria: Save button: camera icon at bottom-right
On save: export canvas texture to PNG
File path: user://paintings/painting_{timestamp}.png
Save painting metadata to database (source='FingerPaint', filepath, created_at)
'Gambar Tersimpan!' label shows for 2 seconds after save
Haptic feedback during draw: continuous ~20Hz vibration
Canvas renders at 30FPS (Engine.max_fps set in _ready())

userStories.title: Shape Silhouette - Scene & Drag System
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to create the ShapeMatch scene with silhouette matching.
acceptanceCriteria: ShapeMatchGame.tscn created with Control root
Silhouette placeholder: ColorRect 100x100px at center, dark blue outline
Draggable options: 3-4 shapes (60x60px) at bottom
Content sets: Rumah Adat (sessions 1-2), Hewan (sessions 3-4), Mix (sessions 5+)
Drag detection: same as DragMatch (10px deadzone, opacity 0.7, scale 1.1)
Drop detection: check if shape position overlaps silhouette placeholder

userStories.title: Shape Silhouette - Match Validation & Progression
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to implement silhouette matching with visual feedback.
acceptanceCriteria: On correct drop: shape animates into silhouette (0.5s slide + scale tween)
Color fills silhouette with 0.3s fade animation
Success SFX + Wayang celebration animation
Auto-transition to next puzzle after 1.5 seconds
Incorrect drop: shape bounces back, gentle SFX only
5-7 puzzles per session, session ends after completion OR 10 minutes

userStories.title: Coloring Book - Template Loading System
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to create template loading with flood-fill capability.
acceptanceCriteria: ColoringGame.tscn created with Control root
Template loading: supports PNG/SVG with segmented regions
Templates: 5 at launch (batik, komodo, anggrek, rumah joglo, melati)
Template resolution: 800x600 for display, 1200x900 for export
Flood-fill algorithm implemented on region tap
Pre-computed fill map generated on template load for performance

userStories.title: Coloring Book - Coloring & Undo System
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to implement region coloring with undo functionality.
acceptanceCriteria: On region tap: fill with current color using flood fill
8 color palette (same as Finger Paint)
Tap + hold on colored region: opens palette for recoloring
Undo button: reverts last color action
Max 20 undo stack (Array[Dictionary] of previous states)
Auto-save after every color change to temporary file
Age-based complexity: 2-3yo (2-3 regions), 3-4yo (5-8 regions), 4-5yo (10-15 regions)

userStories.title: Coloring Book - Export & Gallery Integration
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to export completed colorings to the gallery.
acceptanceCriteria: Save button exports completed coloring to PNG
Export resolution: 1200x900 for print quality
File saved to user://paintings/coloring_{timestamp}.png
Metadata saved to database (source='Coloring', filepath, template_id)
Parent dashboard gallery displays colorings with thumbnails
Download button in gallery saves to device storage

userStories.title: Music Rhythm - Scene & Beat Visuals
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to create the RhythmGame scene with beat circle visuals.
acceptanceCriteria: RhythmGame.tscn created with Control root
4 beat circles (ColorRect) arranged horizontally at center
Each circle: 50x50px, spacing 20px
Beat indicator: circle brightness pulse on beat
Song player: AudioStreamPlayer for backing track
Songs: Twinkle Twinkle ID, Cicak-cicak di Dinding, Lihat Lihat Penyu

userStories.title: Music Rhythm - Tap Detection & Scoring
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to implement beat timing detection and tap scoring.
acceptanceCriteria: Beat tracker: array of beat timestamps (1 second intervals)
Tap detection: gui_input on circles
Timing window: ±0.3s from beat = correct
Correct tap: circle brightens + shrinks (tween), particle effect, ding SFX
Missed beat: circle fades (no error sound), no penalty
Score counter: tracks correct/total beats (hidden from child)
End of song: display 'Kamu dapat X/Y beat!' message with celebration

userStories.title: Parent Dashboard - PIN Login
userStories.description: As a parent, I need a PIN-protected dashboard so that only I can access settings.
acceptanceCriteria: ParentDashboard.tscn scene created
PIN input: 4 LineEdit nodes, focus moves automatically
Default PIN: 1234, stored in user://settings.json
On correct PIN: transition to dashboard content
On incorrect PIN: shake animation, clear input
Change PIN option in dashboard settings
Back button from games goes to menu, NOT dashboard

userStories.title: Parent Dashboard - Child Profile Settings
userStories.description: As a parent, I need to set my child's age and preferences so content is age-appropriate.
acceptanceCriteria: Child Profile section in dashboard
Age slider: HSlider with range 2-5, current value displayed
Name input: LineEdit for child's name (optional)
Content preferences: CheckBox list for each game type
Save button: writes settings to user://child_profile.json
Age value used by all games for content gating
Settings loaded on app startup via GameManager

userStories.title: Parent Dashboard - Playtime Statistics
userStories.description: As a parent, I need to see my child's playtime statistics so I can monitor usage.
acceptanceCriteria: 7-day playtime chart: bar graph using TextureRect or custom draw
Query sessions table for last 7 days data
Y-axis: hours played (0-4 range), X-axis: days of week
Game list: ItemList with 'Game Name: X plays' format
Play count per game aggregated from sessions table
Today's total: Label showing hours played today
Data refreshes when dashboard opens

userStories.title: Parent Dashboard - Gallery & Export
userStories.description: As a parent, I need a gallery to view and download my child's artwork.
acceptanceCriteria: Gallery section: GridContainer of painting thumbnails
Query paintings table for all saved artworks
Thumbnail: TextureRect loaded from filepath
On thumbnail tap: show full-size image in popup
Download button: saves PNG to device Downloads folder
Delete button: removes file and database entry with confirmation
Date label under each thumbnail (format: DD/MM/YYYY)

userStories.title: Parent Dashboard - Settings & Audio Controls
userStories.description: As a parent, I need to configure app settings like language and audio volume.
acceptanceCriteria: Settings tab: TabContainer with sub-sections
Language: OptionButton (Bahasa Indonesia, English)
Audio volume: HSlider for Background, SFX, Voice buses (-20 to 0 dB)
Subtitles: CheckBox toggle (for future text display)
Screen timeout: OptionButton (5 min, 10 min, 15 min, Never)
App size: OptionButton (Lite 30MB, Full 60MB)
All settings saved to user://app_settings.json

userStories.title: Parent Dashboard - Privacy & Legal Links
userStories.description: As a parent, I need access to privacy policy and legal information.
acceptanceCriteria: Privacy Policy button: opens /assets/legal/privacy_policy_id.txt
Terms of Service button: opens /assets/legal/terms_id.txt
Content displayed in scrollable popup dialog
Close button on dialog
Legal documents in Bahasa Indonesia
Cloud sync toggle: CheckBox with '(coming soon)' label disabled

userStories.title: Android Build Configuration
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to configure the Android export for optimal performance.
acceptanceCriteria: Android export preset: Minimum SDK 26 (Android 8.0)
Package name: com.playtap.game (or custom)
Texture compression: VRAM Compression enabled
Audio format: OGG Vorbis for all sounds
Architecture: arm64-v8a (primary), armeabi-v7a (fallback)
Permissions: only WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE for gallery
Export options: Strip binaries enabled for smaller APK

userStories.title: Performance Optimization
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to optimize the app for low-end Android devices.
acceptanceCriteria: FPS capped at 30 via Engine.max_fps = 30 in Main._ready()
Object pooling: balloon/card instances reused (not destroyed)
VisibleOnScreenNotifier2D on particle emitters
Audio preloaded in _ready() for all SFX
Texture import: VRAM compression, max size 1024x1024
Memory usage: <150MB verified via profiler
Tap latency: <100ms perceived responsiveness

userStories.title: Privacy Policy & GDPR Compliance Documents
userStories.description: As a parent, I need clear privacy documentation so I can trust the app with my child.
acceptanceCriteria: privacy_policy_id.txt created in /assets/legal/
States: zero child PII collected, no location/device IDs
States: session data stored locally only, 90-day retention
States: right to data deletion mechanism (clear app data)
GDPR clause: parental consent for any future data features
Indonesian privacy law (PDP Law) compliance statement

userStories.title: Google Play Store Assets Preparation
userStories.description: As a product owner, I need to prepare all assets for Play Store submission.
acceptanceCriteria: App icon: 512x512 PNG, high contrast, PlayTap branding
5 screenshots: 1024x500 (tablet) or 480x360 (phone)
Screenshots show: menu, 3 gameplay examples, parent dashboard
Store description: 80 characters short, 4000 character full in Indonesian
ASO keywords: game balita, edukasi anak, game anak Indonesia, belajar anak
Privacy policy URL: valid link or in-app document

userStories.title: App Signing & Release Build
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to create a signed release build for Play Store.
acceptanceCriteria: Release keystore created with strong password
Android export preset configured with keystore path
Release build (AAB or APK) generated successfully
App size verified: <50MB for lite version
APK tested on physical device before upload
Version code: 1, Version name: 1.0.0
